description: Some up and down hiking.  Need detailed map because of numerous trail juntions.  2.0 mile from TH to top and about 1600' cumulative elevation gain.
directions: Needed. TRAILPEAK EDITOR's NOTE:  Please use wiki edit (below stats) to add directions as this user felt it would be better for others to add directions, or, click Zoom+ near the GPS window to get an expanded view and bring up the map view with streets.  We also have a DIRECTIONS tool in this site, which will give you turn by turn directions to the trail.
title: Mt. Erie
